sentences.en: But change is afoot elsewhere as well, and it isn't always positive.
sentences.cn: 但其它地区也在发生着改变, 而且并不总是积极的.

sentences.en: But something deeper may be afoot, too.
sentences.cn: 不过,更深层的事态或许也在酝酿之中.

sentences.en: Did you came all the way afoot?
sentences.cn: 你是一路走来的 吗 ?

sentences.en: Everybody knew that something awful was afoot.
sentences.cn: 大家都知道可怕的事近在眼前。

sentences.en: If Suellen wanted to go visiting she could go afoot.
sentences.cn: 如果苏伦一定要去访邻会友,她可以步行嘛.

sentences.en: Most of Pitty's friends, like herself, were afoot these days.
sentences.cn: 皮蒂的大多数朋友, 像她自己一样, 现在都是双脚步行了.

sentences.en: Moves are afoot to increase car insurance premiums.
sentences.cn: 现正在酝酿提高汽车的保险费.

sentences.en: New jitters are afoot about a double - dip recession and deflation too.
sentences.cn: 双底衰退和通缩也引发了新的紧张情绪.

sentences.en: Reporters tensed, sensing something big might be afoot.
sentences.cn: 记者都很紧张, 感觉有什么大事要发生了.

sentences.en: She was afoot when I saw her this morning.
sentences.cn: 今天早上我看见她的时候,她正徒步走在路上.

sentences.en: Still at his heels she comes , and once afoot, is never turned aside.
sentences.cn: 但是她跟住了他, 一旦开始,便义无反顾了.

sentences.en: The Indians felt that some new cruelty was afoot.
sentences.cn: 印第安人感到他们又要搞什么坏把戏了.

sentences.en: There are plans afoot to increase taxation.
There's mischief afoot, ie being planned.
There's something afoot here, but I don't know what it is.
sentences.cn: 这里有什么东西不对劲, 但我不知道到底是什么.

words.tran_cn: 在进行中的；徒步的；准备中
